entry.title: Ordination-The First Time I joined
entry.content:
In May 21, the day of 521, just like the word ‘I love you’ in Chinese.

And in the morning, I went to Mineral Research Center to visit the Tan to check my drawing of the Coal Preparation Plant. And she and Mr Peng and others give a lot of advice and show some mistakes. So I need to take much time to redraw it.

And after noon. There is a report in college, I went to join it. Professor Zeng Hongbo make this report about some reseach in University of Alberta. He is less than 30, but already was a professor.

After te report, I found the time is 4 pm, and Miss Zhang send me a message about the Ordination. And I called Ma. She told me she will went back to dormitory firstly. And I think I need too. But when I came to the door of my dormitory, I found it is 4:20. We need to arrive North Gate before 4:40-50.

So I decided to buy a bottole of water and just go north. But Ma did not show.

And I sent a message to ask her where she is. She was in the dormitory and she tell me wait for her. Though I already was on the car to the North Gate, I off the car.

Some minutes later. She came, we went to the North and met Uncle Yao.

And we started to go to the XiXiang Church. It is a long distance. And we talked, talked about a lot of things. From now to a long time ago. Maybe when there 2 people who know each other with a long distance, they will talk a lot more than ever and shared their thought. And when we arrived Xi Xiang Church, It is about 6 pm.

And in Xi Xiang, I found we two have a job to hold the plate with presants.

Pator Ma Wenlong, a pator from US give me a talk about of heart and leadship of pator.

entry.title: Labor Day's Church Meeting
entry.content:
In Labor Day, there are 2 meetings, One is Niu’s web meeting, the othe is church’s meeting in Xuzhou countryside.

I wake up at about 6:40 am and call Qing wake up.

And eat, and take iron plates with Qing to the school’s door. Waited for others to go to the church meeting.

The place there is called 4 Pu, it means Castel 4, but there are not castels, lol.

When we get there, the others from our fellowship was still in the web meeting.

And I help to take the meat off from bamboo slip and string them up with iron slip.

It is an easy job but boring. But I am tired cause it is a good thing for others.

Gao then tell us to go west to have a game. It is calles Transfer the silent word

Then there is a family game Throw and Take, and we students from our school join too. And I played with a boy Su too. It is a kind of fat boy, but cute.

Then we get back to our camp. I still did some work to help others.

At noon, we ate. And the others from web meeting arrived.

We played other games , one is called Transfer Plus Power, it is a good game and a good name.

Zhang tell us a class about Love between person and person, husband and wfe, boyfriend and girl friend, and family and family. there is a book or topic called * Love’s 5 Languages*

When the meeting end, we help the host to to do some farm work, just like the day’s name, Labor Day It is for worker.

And when I went to the well, I saw a turkey, at least I think it is a turkey.

And when I wen to the WC, I saw a marsh gas pool, at least I think it is too.

It is my first time to see these 2 things.

This is a happy day. Thanks! God!

entry.title: The last day in Guangzhou -- Easter Day
entry.content:
Today is Easter Day. In the day before yesterday. When I was at Excahnge-Dream by Jiaqian in Sun Yat-sen University, I poat a post on tieba. It is about is there a fellowship in Sun Yat-sen University?

And I got a posiive answer. And Brother Ding tell me meet him in the Train Stop in Easter Day.

So today , I have been to Liangren Church with Brother Ding.

When we got there, there were just a few brothers and sisters here.And after we put bibles to the chairs. More ones came.

When we started, we sang a welcome song for the newers(I was new that time ).Then we sang songs to praise God. And one brother sang a song called You are my favorate, It is really a beautiful song (Sorry I did not remember the brother’s name, but I record the song). And one sister who is a lead singer in the church sang a song too, beautiful too.

After the Easter show, Priest Ma to teach us about Jesus’s Eternal Love. It really made me moved.

Then our American brothers and sisters show a show about Jesus’s Story(I recorded it too). It is a really good show.

In this morning. I knew two new guys, Brother Ding from Shantou and Brother Ren Xiaorong from US.

Xiaorong is really a open man. And he is really conscientious to learn Chinese. When we talk to Mensa and Tieba, he took seriousty to record it by phone. And he is a man who will talk to you firstly.

About on noon, we ate food. After that I left to train stop.

This is a really good and happy experience. Thanks God!

entry.title: 圣诞节主题的聚会
entry.content:
还有几天就是圣诞节，今天兄弟姐妹们提前以圣诞之名聚集在一起，感谢主。另外，Ji弟兄从澳洲回来，给大家做了一个以自己信仰和求学经历的分享。分享很不错，受益匪浅。

诗歌敬拜之后，是bin哥的分享，随后就是Ji弟兄分享。最让人印象深刻的是Ji弟兄和他GF的情感历程分享，两人同在矿大团契，年级却差了三年，而两人关系确立也是在一个在澳洲、一个在国内。总之，在听两人分享时，很感动，感动两人的历程、更感动于神的大功。

两人一个在赤道南、一个在赤道北，一个在太平洋南，一个在太平洋西。但这却没成为两人之间的阻隔，反而成为两人确立关系的催化剂。而在该姊妹（Sorry 还没记住名字）分享时，她做见证说（大意如下）： “当他发了这句耶稣爱你，我也爱你过后，我给了他发了一封邮件。当我还犹豫不决时，很多人发来的经句（没记住，但都表达出，这是神的旨意）。虽然如此，我还是决定再向神确认。我打电话给他，说这一周不要给我打电话。然后，我向神祷告，求主说，这一周谁给我第一个打电话，谁就是主您给我安排的另一半。”（可能和姊妹原话有出入，但能保证整体无误）

结果，当晚Ji弟兄电话来了。

神对这对儿弟兄姊妹的爱在这一刻就显明了。神爱世人，甚至将他的独生子赐给他们，叫一切信他的，不至灭亡，反得永生。

主若愿意，我们就可以活着，也可以作这事，或作那事。

好久没有写golang的博文了，最近一直忙着实验报告，明天还要赶CAD作业，紧接着还有课程设计，可能Golang内容会停更一段时间，但是会保证有时间后会补回来

愿主保佑这个国家！
